intro: Psychotria cardenasii, commonly known as the Cardenas psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the Andes Mountains in South America, specifically in Ecuador and Peru. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in cloud forests. Psychotria cardenasii is known for its potential medicinal properties and is of interest to botanists and ethnobotrists.
